The next meeting of the Greater Boston Stop the Wars Coalition will be held on Monday, January 11 at 6:30 PM at
Encuentro 5
33 Harrison Avenue, 5th Floor
Boston, MA
(Chinatown Stop on the Orange Line T)

At our last meeting we discussed doing a protest against the continuation of the detention center at Guantanamo Bay as well as having a round-table discussion on Afghanistan at MIT in the near future. We also discussed the upcoming antiwar conference sponsored by New England United and the need to spread the word. We voted to reject the notion that Rightists could impose their politics and agenda on the upcoming conference.

The warmakers in Washington continue to escalate the war against Afghanistan and participate in the blockade against the Palestinian people in the Gaza Strip. The new year confronts us with these challenges as well as others and it is up to us all to rise to the occasion and confront the war machine as we have in the past.
item.name: Antiwar Meetup
